description: User profile page and update endpoint supporting GET (profile display) and POST (profile updates). Accepts first_name, last_name, email, profile_picture (file upload), and profile_picture_url (URL fetch) parameters. Requires authentication (returns 302 redirect to /login when unauthenticated).
notes: Protected endpoint with authentication requirement. Redirects to /login when not authenticated (302 status). Supports both file upload (profile_picture) and URL fetching (profile_picture_url) for profile pictures. URL fetch parameter is a potential vector for SSRF, XXE, or malicious file retrieval attacks. File upload is a potential vector for RCE or path traversal attacks.",
